name: Déjà Vu - Zoo
description:
Déjà Vu - Zoo is a free app that introduces players to the Déjà Vu puzzles with 11 fun zoo creatures in four challenging puzzle sizes.

Déjà Vu is a memory and pattern matching game that will also sharpen the concentration skills of jigsaw puzzle lovers.

Players have long matched two cards at a time in order to beat their opponent and called it Concentration, Memory, Pairs, or Match Match. We’ve added some more twists that turn it into a whole new game that we think you’ll like!

Déjà Vu is designed for both tablets and phones. A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.

BONUS! Buy any paid Déjà Vu puzzle app by GabySoft and unlock the full version of Déjà Vu - Zoo with 35 total puzzles free!
